content.rendered:
D-HAT™ 3000

The D-HAT™ 3000 from Hydrogen On Demand Technologies is made for diesel power generators (gensets). It is ideal for generators with engines between 20 and 80 liters.

D-HAT™ 3000 How It Works

The D-HAT™ 3000 generates the correct amount of hydrogen, on-demand, to join the air/fuel mixture as it enters the genset engine for combustion.  The addition of hydrogen allows for a more complete fuel burn, almost eliminating harmful emissions, and improving fuel efficiency.

The D-HAT™ 3000’s patented PEM cell produces hydrogen through electrolysis from just steam distilled water and power from the engine’s alternator. Because this process happens on-demand, there is no storage of hydrogen, and the D-HAT™ 3000 is completely safe.

D-HAT™ Technology

Making a Positive Impact Reducing Greenhouse Gas Emissions

Green activists continue to call for elimination of all diesel engines. Even land based diesel backup and fulltime duty generators are feeling the pressure. Today in 2024, that is simply not an option for current battery and renewable energy solutions. Besides the extreme cost to exchange diesel Genset’s with renewable energy products, there are not enough available products to replace them with en masse. HODT has the solution today with an affordable solution to virtually eliminate emissions and save fuel. There are thousands of workhorse Genset’s across the globe that are adaptable to the D-HAT™ 3000. Our solution not only enables these engines to survive but also pays for itself in reduced fuel usage. In many regions around the world, a Genset generator is the only power available especially in remote areas and after natural disasters.

Massive battery power storage is not as cost effective as hydrogen production and storage. Today’s mining of raw materials to make a battery is a rape of the land.

About D-HAT™ Technology

Designed, Built, and Supported In The USA

Our supply partners are based in the USA. We are also bringing on additional capacity in Japan to support our APAC customer base. All of our primary and critical components are designed and produced in the USA.

D-HAT™ 3000 Available Now

Ready to start saving money and making a positive impact? Great, we’re ready to help.

We have experience with most common diesel power generation (gensets) and off-road diesel engines.  Our product is completely safe and installs easily. The D-HAT™ 3000 from Hydrogen On Demand Technologies is the right technology, right now, and ready to deploy globally.

Request a Quote
